title: Can i play league of legends at my house and at my friends house
body:
I was wondering can i play lol at 2 differents places (locations)??
Anyone plz help me or let me know if it is possible..

replies.body:
You can certainly play at different locations. Be aware that if you use someone else's computer, you should ensure there aren't any programs that could cause issues for your account if you play on the PC. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
You're allowed to log in to League from any computer and any location, though mind that you'll get banned if you manage to travel from Chicago to New York within 2 minutes.
